EmailTemplate.name: PAS 2019.201906_EMEAI_BrunchReminder_PAS_MC
EmailTemplate.subject: Honeywell Brunch at Paris Air Show
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Guest}}, Thank you for registering to attend the Honeywell Brunch on Sunday 16th June. We are looking forward to hosting you at Le Pré-Catelan. We wanted to share some details which may be helpful as you plan your attendance at the event.
Date: 16th June 2019
Time: 11:00 - 14:30
Location: Le Pré Catelan – Salons Bois de Boulogne, Route de la Grande Cascade 75000 Paris
Dress Code: Business attire
If you have registered a guest to accompany you, we have captured their details and are looking forward to hosting both you and your guest at the event.
There is on-site parking available at the venue.
If you have any queries or questions, please do not hesitate to contact us on the details below: Helena Harris: helena.wilson@honeywell.com <[[mailto:helena.wilson@honeywell.com]]> Telephone: +44 (0)7805 682076
